pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Proportional Hazards in Randomized Controlled Trials // Perform a stratified weighted log-rank test in a randomized controlled trial. Tests can be visualized as a difference in average score on the two treatment arms. These methods are described in Magirr and Burman (2018) arXiv:1807.11097v1, Magirr (2020) arXiv:2007.04767v1, and Magirr and Jimenez (2022) arXiv:2201.10445v1.
